definition: to be out of the question
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: We've only been dating two days; it's nowhere near a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我们才谈了两个月的恋爱，还谈不上结婚的事。

sentences.english: She did not remain anything like faithful to him.
sentences.chinese: 她后来对他就根本谈不上什么忠贞不渝了。

sentences.english: There can be no question of holding forth on ethics.
sentences.chinese: 这里谈不上坚守道德准绳的问题。

sentences.english: Although the back row space comes to valuable be bigger than, but is also far from spaciously .
sentences.chinese: 后排空间虽比宝来要大，但也谈不上宽敞。

sentences.english: And yet the mood of this exhausted country is far from jubilant.
sentences.chinese: 然而这个精疲力尽的国家其心情远谈不上高兴。

sentences.english: Note that these scripts are far from perfect.
sentences.chinese: 注意，这些脚本远谈不上完美。

sentences.english: But members of the league could also have less altruistic motives.
sentences.chinese: 但是，阿盟各成员国的动机也谈不上大公无私。

sentences.english: As you can see, the patches have been rebuilt, but are far from being continuous.
sentences.chinese: 你看，这些面片已经重建过了，但是还远谈不上连续。

sentences.english: They have not lived together ever since getting married, let alone have feelings for each other.
sentences.chinese: 婚后他们没有一起生活，更谈不上夫妻感情。

sentences.english: Had the virus mutated to a more virulent form, we would not be talking about forging ahead.
sentences.chinese: 倘若病毒变异，毒性更强，我们将谈不上稳步前进。

sentences.english: It's a vital part of staying healthy and being able to work creatively.
sentences.chinese: 没有休息，就谈不上身体健康，谈不上创造性地工作。

sentences.english: It's a vital part of staying healthy and being able to work creatively.
sentences.chinese: 没有休息，就谈不上身体健康，谈不上创造性地工作。

sentences.english: They do not live together ever since marriage, not mentioning conjugal affection.
sentences.chinese: 婚后他们没有一起生活，更谈不上夫妻感情。

sentences.english: After getting married, I did not even live together, let alone loving each other.
sentences.chinese: 婚后他们没有一起生活，更谈不上夫妻感情。

sentences.english: There was no road to speak of: the lorry driver just took the smoothest track.
sentences.chinese: 谈不上有什么道路，司机只是选最平整的地方开车。

sentences.english: You may not love your boss. You may not even like your boss.
sentences.chinese: 你可能不爱你的老板，甚至连喜欢都谈不上。
